reviews.review: Заебись, но на персов долго копить
Entre um bug e outro é muito divertido
Like most multiplayer games you just want to kill them when someone trolls you real good. If you're the killer, it's literally your job.
Realmente, um OTIMO jogo pra se divertir sozinho e muito mais com os amigos recomendo muito
Get it! Definetly worth your money, specially during a sale!
Gostei de morre, não gostei de morre!

I really love this game. Highly recommend this game ! Best Value for money investment that I've done in my life. 
Thank you guys for bringing this game to life +++++++++++++++

this game is trash but fun
I think is a good game overall but the waiting time to find a match is like a eternity. And please don t play nurse :))

El juego es muy bueno, super divertido jugando solo o con amigos, sin embargo tiene problemas que no importa que tan bueno sea me quitan la experiencia por completo, no solo por la comunidad y sus formas de jugar, si no por sus fallos en tan solo el menu y su conexion, se me a desconectado infinidad de veces de la partida, baneandome y perdiendo puntos a lo absurdo, no es problema de mi internet la verdad no tengo ni idea pero no soy al unico que le pasa, me encanta el juego, pero su comunidad (no toda que luego se disfruta arduamente) y sus desconexiones por sus servidores me dan ganas de tirar el juego bien a la basura.
nie polecam straszny grind plus pay2win bez dlc nie da rady

Pros:
Unique gameplay.
Good graphics and sound.

Cons:
Developers favor pushing out new characters over fixing what already exists.
All the survivors will die 90% of the time, the only way to stand a fair chance at surviving is to wait till everyone else dies and find the hatch with Bill's perk.
The Doctor.

It just hasn't been a fun game for a long time.
玩人一下就匹配到了 玩鬼半个小时都匹配不到人 为什么？？？  真香
Been playing this game for a couple years now and what keeps attracting me back is the genre and originality

As a friend of mine said in his review: most players don't know how the game works. Survivors are a loooot toxic even when they have no reason.
They mock you even when they score less, saying it was easy, because they think escaping means winning. And when they lose by a lot, they call you names.
The same goes for killers that think sacrificing a single survivor and doing nothing else means some kind of win.

 This is an awesome game as long as you keep the comments box always closed.

there is for sure a learning curve to this game. I would highly highly recem. starting leveling feng min first-wish they would suggest her more openly. She gives a perk that helps level the learning curve for skill checks. Every game is unique as a mix of perks and killer and maps creates a learnable but unique play-style. of course Only negative after learning curve is the openly bad teammates you can get. These happen more than occasionally-but as you rank up you get less and less (midranks are the hardest) and the game because more and more intense. 4/5 would kill time with and enjoy

I love and hate this game at the same time
Das Spiel fesselt einen und ist wirklich Nerven zerrend.
fucking amazing when a killer just hits you

Nie chce mi się tlumaczyć dlaczego taka ocena, w skrocie balans jest zdupiony.
me encanta yo solo lo veia en directos
Eu diria que se não fosse pelos bugs, seria legal esse jogo kk.

Great game with a decently large skill ceiling. Great support by the community and great support by the devs. 
Bugs are really the only large problem that the game holds due to how frequent they are seen sometimes ruining games for survivors. Great game to get on steam plus its also on sale a decent amount of the time. Great game to play with friends and almost always a blast to play.

Good idea but poor realisation. Lot of bugs, ping issues (poor experience for players from some regions) and extrimely bad matchmaking (be ready to play 16-20 lvl killer vs 2-4 hight rank party). Recommend for players with steel nerves only.

11 "How did he hit me" / 10
I hate this game with a passion, yet it is the first game I start playing after coming home from work. Ghostface/10 would recommend

Lovely game to chill with. 
Great game design.
If you like to grind a little this is a fun game.

Unique,fun,favors skilled players.
All around great game.
If you hate yourself and/or are a masochist, I highly recommend this game.
Bardzo ciekawa i oryginalna gra jest dużo silnych zabujców oraz szybkich ocalałych gra jest kozak tylko nowa postać jest taka średnia   mam nadzieję że następna będzie lepsza

玩人跟大家一起玩就很好玩，單排可能只適合想安靜玩遊戲的人
Made my friends shit their pants
인성질이 너무 취항저격이네요 살인마는 절대 안할 듯

I own this game for all systems except for the switch. The doctor has came with my game on ps4 and xbox, but for some reason it doesnt come with the steam purchase. I have spent a ridiculous amount of money on this game and add ons, so it would be nice to get what I paid for.

ゲーム自体は面白いです。
しかしキラーがとても少なく理由が生存者側がとてもPTで煽るなどが多くキラー自体がとてもストレスがたまります
マッチングに関しても生存者はかなり長く待たされキラーはマッチがとても速いですがランクがあっていない高ランクプレイヤーとマッチしボコボコにされることが多く煽りとマッチシステムは改善すればまだましなゲームになります。
キラー自体は色々な個性のあるキラーばかりで一部弱いキラーなどもいますが差別化はされておりまともにゲームできれば面白いです。
ただどちらにも言えるのですがスキルが各キャラ3つありそれを開放して他キャラに使えるようにするのがとても大変で開放するポイントを貯めるためにゲームをしてもボコボコにされるとろくにポイントが入らず初心者にとても厳しいので必須スキルと言われているスキルなどは最初から開放するなどのシステムを入れなければ新規が増えず増えても煽りなどで辞めていく人が多く
そこが問題です、格ゲーの初狩りをずっとされてる感じです。
それを我慢してプレイできるなら戦えるようにはなります。
PS4版をやっていたのですが引継ぎができないのがとても残念です
ハッキリ言ってキラーがいないとゲームにならないのにキラーがあまりにも冷遇されすぎている走って移動するだげのゲームです駆け引きも何もありません動画などをでもわかるように上手いプレイヤー基準でゲームを作っているので我慢図よくこのゲームしかしない人しかできません一人も連れずに終わるなども多いゲームなのでこれを買うぐらいならほかのゲームや生活用品などを買うほうがお金と時間の無駄になりません
絶対にこのゲームは買うな

I love this damn game its really fun and has a lot of replayability,I highly recommend this game, however it is not perfect, still pretty buggy and there are some balancing issues, but overall a great game
